name: Possum Dating Simulator
description:
Go on an adventure in, around, and possibly under your house as you try to meet your perfect possum match! There are 13 possible possum love connections. Can you find them all?

This silly game was developed entirely for fun, and is in no way  meant to represent real life. PLEASE DO NOT TRY TO DATE ANY POSSUMS THAT YOU MAY FIND IN THE WILD. This game does not condone the domestication, disturbance,  or destruction of possums. They are docile creature marsupials who wish to be left alone. If you see a possum in distress, please contract your local wildlife society/reservation.
